leftSwitch.name: Previous Startpos
leftSwitch.description: Switches to the previous startpos, wraps around

rightSwitch.name: Next Startpos
rightSwitch.description: Switches to the next startpos, wraps around

hide.name: Don't fade on start
hide.description: Does not make the menu fade from max opacity when you first open a level

ignoreDisabled.name: Ignore Disabled
ignoreDisabled.description: Ignores start positions that have been disabled

issues.info: If you have an issue with the mod please report it here!
